name: pushbullet-desktop
description: Pushbullet for Desktop is a lightweight cross-platform Pushbullet Client for OS X, Windows and Linux. It enables you to receive native system notifications in an unobstrusive way.

packageJSON.name: pb-for-desktop
packageJSON.description: PushBullet desktop application for macOS, Windows and Linux

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.6.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
 - Improved connectivity detection 
 - Further reduced CPU usage
 - Further decreased memory footprint

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.5.3
releases.body:
### 🚨 Fixes
- Settings persistence
- Image asset lookup (fixes #17)

### 🔧 Internals
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.5.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Integration of Pushbullet End-to-End encrypted messaging -  (🙏🏽 @andrebeat)
- End-to-End encryption setup workflow
- Dependency installation enforcement for Linux-based platforms

### 🚨 Fixes
- Many, many bugfixes and performance enhancements

### 🔧 Internals
- Main & support components modularized
- JSDoc coverage increased
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.3.1
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Added ``pacman`` ArchLinux package
- Added ``AppImage`` package

### 📒 Documentation
- Updated readme

### 🔧 Internals
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.2.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Native titlebars
- Native translucent menu sidebars (macOS)

### 🚨 Fixes
- #13 

### 🔧 Internals
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v3.1.0
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Automatic deployment of latest versions to [https://sidneys.github.io/pb-for-desktop](https://sidneys.github.io/pb-for-desktop)

### 🚨 Fixes
- Fixes for auto updating
- Multiple user interface fixes
- Delivery of ghost pushes upon device usage

### 🔧 Internals
- Dependencies upgrade
- Buildsystem upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v2.9.978
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Additional tray Icons
- Realtime connectivity monitoring

### 🔧 Internals
- Electron 1.4.14
- Dependencies upgrade

releases.name: PB for Desktop v2.9.976
releases.body:
### 🍾 Features
- Automatic in-app updates (macOS)
- Improved offline handling

### 🚨 Fixes
- Run as CLI module

### 🔧 Internals
- Size optimisation (25%)
- Electron 1.4.13
- Dependencies upgrade
- Buildsystem upgrade
